tweet.text: Just released, a @historyatstate documentary on U.S. diplomatic couriers in the 1950s. Check out what it was like to take the Orient Express from #Vienna to #Bucharest in Behind the Iron Curtain: https://t.co/k3VbG2rN8B #EverythingHasAHistory
tweet.html: Just released, a @HistoryAtState documentary on U.S. diplomatic couriers in the 1950s. Check out what it was like to take the Orient Express from #Vienna to #Bucharest in Behind the Iron Curtain: go.usa.gov/xPmG3 #EverythingHasAHistory
